home.title: MatchOps Local - Soccer Coaching App for Local Data Privacy

footer.dataStays: Your data stays on your device. Always.

hero.title: Technical Specifications
hero.subtitle: Architecture, technology stack, and system requirements

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.localFirstDesc: All data stored locally on your device using IndexedDB. No external servers or databases required.
architecture.offlineFirstDesc: Full functionality without internet connection. Network only required for PWA updates.
architecture.singleUserDesc: Designed for individual coaches. One installation per device, no authentication or user management.

techStack.title: Technology Stack
techStack.languageDesc: TypeScript for type safety and better developer experience
techStack.stylingDesc: Tailwind CSS 4 for responsive, modern UI
techStack.storageDesc: Browser IndexedDB with async storage adapters
techStack.stateManagementDesc: React Query for server state, useReducer for game session state
techStack.pwaDesc: Service Worker for offline capability and app-like experience
techStack.i18nDesc: next-i18next for English and Finnish support

storage.title: Storage & Data
storage.indexedDBDesc: Uses device's free storage space (typically tens to hundreds of GB available). Typical usage: under 50MB for 100+ games.
storage.dataScaleDesc: Optimized for 50-100 players, 50-100 games per season. Small dataset, fast performance.
storage.backupDesc: Full data export to JSON format. Import/restore on any device.
storage.privacyDesc: Zero data transmission. Everything stays on your device.

requirements.title: System Requirements
requirements.javascriptDesc: Must be enabled (standard in all modern browsers)
requirements.storageSpaceDesc: Minimum 50MB recommended (typical usage is much less)
requirements.privateModeDesc: Not supported (PWA installation requires persistent storage)

performance.title: Performance
performance.responseTimeDesc: Sub-50ms for all interactions (local data access)
performance.batteryDesc: No constant syncing or network polling

whatIsThis.title: What is MatchOps Local?
whatIsThis.description: MatchOps Local is a mobile app for soccer coaches. It helps you manage teams, track and document games in real-time, and build statistics—all from your phone or tablet.
whatIsThis.oneLine: No signup required. Install once and your data stays private on your device. Works anywhere, even without internet.

challenges.title: Common Challenges for Coaches
challenges.challenge1: Planning positions ahead of time practically requires using grid notebooks and loose papers, which can be cumbersome to use
challenges.challenge2: Multiple tools needed on game day: clipboard, stopwatch, notebook
challenges.challenge3: Coach needs to focus on the match and doesn't have time to easily document field events besides substitution moments
challenges.challenge4: Most things on match day remain undocumented and eventually get completely forgotten
challenges.challenge5: No easy way to track development and trends over longer periods like seasons or tournaments
challenges.challenge6: Risk that decisions and assessments over the long term are based on intuition rather than data
challenges.challenge7: Justifying gut-feeling decisions can be challenging

technical.title: Technical Details
technical.desc1: MatchOps Local is a Progressive Web App (PWA). This means it installs like a native app but runs in your web browser.
technical.desc2: All data is stored locally on your device using IndexedDB, a browser database. No internet connection is required to use the app.
technical.desc3: Compatible with iOS Safari, Android Chrome, and all major desktop browsers.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.q1: How do I install the app?
faq.a1: Open the app in your browser [Link coming soon]. The app will prompt you to install it - just tap 'Install'.
faq.a2: All data is stored locally on your device in IndexedDB (browser storage). Nothing is sent to external servers.
faq.q3: Can I use it on multiple devices?
faq.a3: Yes, but you'll need to export your data from one device and import it on another. There's no automatic syncing since everything is stored locally.
faq.q4: How do I back up my data?
faq.a4: Open the Settings menu and use the Export function. This creates a JSON file with all your data that you can save and import later.
faq.q5: Can I edit game data after it's recorded?
faq.a5: Yes. You can edit, add or delete goal events, and edit match details. Just open the game from your history and make corrections.
faq.q6: What happens if I lose my phone or it breaks?
faq.a6: If you've made regular exports (backups), you can import your data on a new device. Without backups, data is lost with the device.
faq.a7: Yes. You can create and manage multiple teams (U12, U14, etc.) from the same app and switch between them easily.
faq.q8: How much storage space does the app use?
faq.a8: The app uses your device's free storage space through IndexedDB. Available space depends on your device and can be tens or even hundreds of gigabytes. Typical usage with 100+ games and full statistics is under 50MB.
